title: Fix XSS filter bug
body:
https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/platform/issues/6324601/
https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/platform/issues/9711883/
https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/platform/issues/8875631/

comments.body: The XSS filter has been removed in 1809 so it's totally good now.
Pleass can you fixsit for my Laptop voice.

As noted in the latest bug, these are being resolved since they are being treated as feature deliverables with larger scope than the bugs tracked in the Issue Tracker. The work is being tracked and prioritized and we can use this UserVoice item to track public feedback.
